column4: I have this line in lsusb Bus 003 Device 004: ID 0fce:e0da Sony Ericsson Mobile Communications AB. How do I mount this?
Umm, why do you think you can mount it at all?

I thought it should be possible when the phone is in Mass Storage mode. When I connect in Phone mode I can sometimes access using Wammu. In Media mode F-Spot Photo Manager finds all the files, but only makes sense of the photos.
Mass storage, yes. Check dmesg for messages about usb-storage and sdb or something when you plug it in.
